author: xtqqczze
body:
Follow-up: #13946

Perhaps we should consider hosting a private nuget repository for modules such Pester, PowerShellGet, etc that we rely on for the build process.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I think it makes no sense. We had the modules in the repository and removed. I don’t think that rare outages are worth the effort to maintain additional nuget repositories.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: I agree with @iSazonov. If we expect others to take a dependency on PowerShell Gallery for their CI, we should be no different.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Unavailability of Powershell Gallery should not break CI
